column4: I just want to find a way to install ubuntu, and the size must less than 538 MB .

You can't. Compressing folders from Ubuntu can cause major instability, because of the fact that the more you compress flies, the greater the chance is that something is going to go wrong during the decommpression/compression.
If you want an Ubuntu installation like that, try Lubuntu. It is a 520mb Live CD I believe.
A USB startup disk is like the LiveCD, except on a USB device. You know, on a flash drive.
